rules_text:
Flying, vigilance
[i]Triangle Attack[/i] – Whenever Florina, Flora, & Farina attack, they deal 3 damage to target opponent. Until your next turn, spells that player casts cost {2} more to cast. Draw a card.
[i]Sister's United[/i] – Whenever a creature with flying attacks you, each creature you control with flying deals 1 damage to that attacking creature.
